At Choice Hotels, we know how important your trips are to you because they’re important to us too.  We’re proud to help you find hotels that make it possible for you to connect with the people who matter most.  Whether you are seeking leisure or business hotels, in the U.S. or around the globe, with more than 6,300 hotels in over 35 countries and territories our hotels are never far from where you need to be.  You can always count on our hotels for a warm welcome and real value, and with our Choice Privileges® rewards program we ensure that travel is as rewarding as possible.  You might say that all of these things make Choice brands simply the best. And we don’t mind if you think that.  Additional corporate information can be found at http://www.choicehotels.com.•Builds and maintains networks and relationships with key business leaders across multiple functional areas and vendors to ensure business needs are supported and successfully delivered.•Ensures vendor adherence to defined company processes and standards across all service streams under the MSA.•Tracks vendor Key Performance Indicators (KPI) - successful fill rate, cycle time, rate compliance, hiring manager/client satisfaction.•Coordinates and participates in all stages of the full life cycle recruiting process. •Partners with hiring managers to create a hiring plan, clarifies position requirements; creates recruiting strategies and determines deliverables.•Develops unique screening and interview questions specific to each position.•Uses various sourcing techniques for qualified job candidates; networking events, internet recruiting resources, media advertisements, job fairs, recruiting firms, and employee referrals.•Pre-screens and presents top qualified candidates to hiring managers, makes recommendations as needed. •Extends job offers, negotiates salary, and explains health benefits.•Hires employees and processes hiring-related paperwork in PeopleSoft and Workday.

Since its inception in 1984, Randstad Technologies has worked hard to become one of the largest IT staffing companies in the country. Achieved by providing a fun, supportive work environment where employees are encouraged to reach their potential. At Randstad Technologies we believe the best investment we can make is hiring quality people.•Responsible for agency recruiting (sourcing, interviewing, references, and salary negotiation) of    Information Technology Professionals locally and nationally. •Utilized various candidate sourcing methodologies, including direct sourcing, cold calling,   networking events, targeted emails, advertising, and candidate referral. •Participated in the development and execution of both short-term and long-term recruiting        strategies to ensure account growth, profitability, and build client relationships with Fortune 500 clients. •Interviewed prospective candidates and educated candidates on company processes.•Negotiated terms with candidates and clients to finalize placements.

John Sperling, PhD, a Cambridge-educated economist and professor-turned-entrepreneur, founded University of Phoenix in 1976. He made a commitment to provide working adults with higher education at times convenient to them.Today, our students study online, as well as at locations nationwide, with availability in countries around the world. Not only do students attend classes that are convenient, they earn degrees that are built for the careers they want.Our commitment extends to our higher education innovations as well. University of Phoenix offers many conveniences for working adult students including evening classes, flexible scheduling, continuous enrollment, a university-wide academic social network, online classes, a digital library and computer simulations.In addition, University of Phoenix has over 25 years of experience in online education — a kind of education that’s research-proven to be just as effective as conventional instruction.Our faculty members have both real-world and academic experience. This means students can use what they learn in class the very next day they’re at work. And we offer associate, bachelor's, master’s, doctoral, and certificate programs — to give students choices and room to grow.Academic Counselor•Served as corporate liaison between the University and the students.•Advised students on course selection, academic plan, and progress toward graduation and career decisions.•Attended community and campus events.Training Specialist•Identified development opportunities and succession gaps.•Communicated all learning and performance objectives, schedules and training assessments to upper management.•Reviewed and edited all training materials for accuracy and policy compliance.

Founded in 1957, Enterprise Rent-A-Car is an internationally recognized brand with more than 6,000 neighborhood and airport locations in the United States, Canada, the U.K., Ireland and Germany. With more than 5,500 offices located within 15 miles of 90 percent of the U.S. population, Enterprise Rent-A-Car offers a wide variety of car leasing, vanpooling, car sharing and hourly rental programs – and local car rental customers are picked up at no extra cost. We are committed to doing things the right way: taking care of our customers, our employees and the communities we serve. It’s what we call “The Enterprise Way,” and it has been the foundation for our growth and success for more than five decades. Enterprise pioneered the replacement rental business in the 1960s. Since then we have invested hundreds of millions of dollars in technology to better serve our partners in the insurance, body shop and dealership segments. For example, our patented Automated Rental Management System (ARMS®) streamlines the rental reservation process for insurance companies, body shops, and dealerships, allowing them to serve their customers better. Widely recognized as an employer of choice hiring more than 8,000 college graduates each year, Enterprise been repeatedly named a “Best Place to Launch a Career” by BusinessWeek Magazine and a "Top Employer for Women" by The Times.Account Executive/Management Trainee•Created new revenue streams and built a book of business through effective marketing strategies.•Drove business development by building strong customer relations•Researched account activity to resolve problems and provide on-going support.•Promoted to Account Executive within 6 months.•Completed company leadership training program.•Extensively trained new and existing employees.

I worked closely with Josetta Morales at Choice Hotels during 2014 and 2015 while she was a recruiter and I was a software engineering manager.  She was one of the key recruiters that helped me build a top notch engineering team of over 30 software engineers in just a few months.  Her natural talents of relationship building and coordination across multiple vendors made the hiring surge successful in a market that is highly competitive for engineers and other roles in I.T.  She has both technical breadth and communication savvy - a combination of traits that is highly sought after in the IT field and also knows just how valuable those qualities are on successful IT teams.  Her technical knowledge and communication savvy, among her other talents that I mentioned, make her a top notch recruiter with a record of building high producing and enthusiastic teams that impress positive change across an organization.

Director, Test Engineering at Choice Hotels International
September 22, 2015, Brian J. worked with Josetta in different groups

I have worked with Josetta at Choice Hotels for over a year now. During this time, we completed a very challenging ramp-up in hiring. Working with Josetta, I interviewed well over one hundred candidates, and hired upwards of 40.Josetta works tirelessly. She cares very much about what exactly the hiring manager is looking for, and helps the hiring manager refine their vision. Her candidate screening is very effective. In fact, I believe it took us one meeting to refine vision, and out of the hundreds of candidates she screened, there were zero clear misses. I never felt like I was wasting my time in an interview, because Josetta made sure very qualified candidates (both in skills and in team fit) sat across from me.She works well with new technologies, is prompt with her deliverables, and never drops the ball (and would never let me drop one either). I heartily recommend Josetta to any company who desires a hard-working, laser-focused HR professional.
